document.full_text: back at his best, cliff lee struck out 12 in a three-hit shutout thursday night, allowing the philadelphia phillies to a 4-0 victory over the washington nationals.
document.title: baseball roundup: lee allows 3 hits as phillies shut out the nationals
lines_and_colors: back at his best, cliff lee struck out 12 in a three-hit shutout thursday night, allowing the philadelphia phillies to a 4-0 victory over the washington nationals.
